[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@datashaper/schema](./schema.md) &gt; [DataBundleSchema](./schema.databundleschema.md)

## DataBundleSchema interface

This defines the data-bundle schema, which is a collection of table-centric resources. The data-table represents the data-source and parsing options. The codebook represents interpretation options and data-type mappings. The workflow represents data-wrangling steps.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DataBundleSchema extends ResourceSchema 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ResourceSchema](./schema.resourceschema.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [codebook?](./schema.databundleschema.codebook.md) |  | string \| [CodebookSchema](./schema.codebookschema.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Resource path to the codebook file, which contains the interpretation options and data-type mappings. |
|  [datatable?](./schema.databundleschema.datatable.md) |  | string \| [DataTableSchema](./schema.datatableschema.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Resource path to the datatable file, which contains the data source and parsing options. |
|  [workflow?](./schema.databundleschema.workflow.md) |  | string \| [WorkflowSchema](./schema.workflowschema.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Resource path to the workflow file, which contains the data-wrangling steps. |
